items.title: South Africa calls gender violence a national disaster after protests
items.description: Fifteen women are killed every day in a country with one of the highest rates of gender violence in the world.

items.title: UN climate summit drops mention of fossil fuels from draft deal
items.description: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

items.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
items.description: Security forces have launched operations to assess the situation and locate the missing pupils.

items.title: Russia yet to receive anything official from US on Ukraine peace plan, Kremlin says
items.description: The draft provisions come across as heavily slanted towards Moscow, but Volodymyr Zelensky says he is ready to work with the US.

items.title: Canadian man loses legal battle to reclaim million-dollar stash
items.description: Marcel Breton spent 16 years trying to reclaim C$1.2m police seized from hiding spots in his house.
